column4: whisk 1 cup of chilled curd until smooth. Use fresh homemade or packaged curd)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: add-add 1 tablespoon of chopped cilantro leaves to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-1/4 teaspoon salt to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add 1 teaspoon of cumin powder to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-1/2 teaspoon of chaat masala powder to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-1/4 teaspoon of red chilli powder to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: chop or grate-chop or grate the cucumber)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add the chopped or grated cucumber to the whisked curd)']
[' (StepDescription: Combine-Combine all the ingredients in the bowl)']
